Class org.aimas.craftingquest.state.CellState extends Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

type

CellState.CellType type
terrain type

pos

Point2i pos
position on the map

visibleResources

HashMap<K,V> visibleResources
quantities of each visible resource

craftedObjects

HashMap<K,V> craftedObjects
quantities of each crafted object (must have been previously dropped by an other unit)

cellUnits

List<E> cellUnits
the list of units present in the cell - as seen by an opponent's view

strategicResource

StrategicResource strategicResource
the strategic resource (may be null) contained in this cell.

Class org.aimas.craftingquest.state.CraftedObject extends Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

type

CraftedObject.ObjectType type
the object type

value

int value
the object value

requiredObjects

List<E> requiredObjects
If not null, this field gives a list of alternative ways of constructing a complex object.
Each alternative is a mapping between CraftedObjects and their required quantities.

requiredResources

List<E> requiredResources
If not null, this field gives a list of alternative ways of constructing a simple object.
Each alternative is a mapping between BasicResourceTypes and their required quantities.

Class org.aimas.craftingquest.state.PlayerState extends Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

id

Integer id
the unique player identifier

units

List<E> units
the list of UnitStates - the player's units

availableBlueprints

List<E> availableBlueprints
the list of game wide available blueprints.

This structure will be initialized automatically at start up.

It contains all the blueprints available for purchase in the game.

Players know this list from the very beginning, but cannot construct an object unless they buy the necessary blueprint

boughtBlueprints

List<E> boughtBlueprints
the list of blueprints bought by this player

availableTowers

HashMap<K,V> availableTowers
A HashMap that contains the status for each tower constructed by the player

credit

int credit

mapWidth

int mapWidth

mapHeight

int mapHeight

response

TransitionResult response
the TransitionResult response for the last transition. It will be null if no transition was made.

round

RoundState round
the round information

x

int x

y

int y

Class org.aimas.craftingquest.state.RoundState extends Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

currentRound

int currentRound
the current game round

noRounds

int noRounds
the total number of game rounds

roundDuration

long roundDuration
the duration of a round in milliseconds

startTime

long startTime
the startTime of the current round - relative to the start of the game

remainingTime

long remainingTime
how much time is still left from the current round

Class org.aimas.craftingquest.state.UnitState extends Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

opponentPerspective

BasicUnit opponentPerspective
the opponent view for this unit

id

int id
the unit id

playerID

int playerID
the id of the player that owns the unit

type

UnitState.UnitType type
the unit type

energy

int energy
the unit energy points

scannedResourceAttributes

List<E>[][] scannedResourceAttributes
the last scanned resource attributes. the field will be reset to null before each action attempt

currentCellResources

HashMap<K,V> currentCellResources
the last dug up soil resources. the field will be reset to null before each action attempt

carriedResources

HashMap<K,V> carriedResources
the list of carried basic resources and their associated quantities

carriedObjects

HashMap<K,V> carriedObjects
the list of carried objects and their associated quantities

pos

Point2i pos
the unit position

sight

CellState[][] sight

The unit sight. It is a fixed 5x5 array of CellState objects.

The unit is positioned in the middle of the visibility array.

If the unit is near the margins of the map, cells falling outside the boundaries will be null.
